name: Godless Healing
text: You have mastered a specialized and complex technique to ignore pain by focusing your belief on the self rather than relying on faith.
benefit: Once per day when you have half your total hit points or fewer, you may heal yourself of an amount of damage equal to 1d8 plus your total Hit Dice as a move action. This is a supernatural ability.
special: You can take this feat more than once. Each time you do, you may heal yourself one additional time per day.
text_zh: 你擅长通过凝聚信念的力量进行某种复杂的技艺来压制疼痛，而非依赖信仰之力。
prerequisites_zh: 不能信仰神祇（Cannot have a patron deity）。
benefit_zh: 每日1次，当你的生命值降低至总生命值的一半或更低时，你可以以移动动作治疗自身的伤害，数值为1d8 + 你的总生命骰点生命值。这是一个超自然能力。
special_zh: 你能够多次选取该专长。每次你选取该专长，每日治疗自身的次数额外增加1次。
